EN | FR

Singer-Songwriter

Native of Beauharnois, Aujo is a singer-songwriter with eclectic influences, skillfully blending R&B, rap and pop to create a unique sound, both modern and timeless. A true alchemist of genres, she explores urban rhythms and pop melodies with a very personal touch.
